summary.span: 这是与相应的 COM 对象的互操作性的托管代码需要 COM coclass 中的主接口。

span.span: This is a primary interface in a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

summary.span: 仅当您想要使用的方法共享相同的名称的 COM 对象; 事件时，才使用此主接口在这种情况下，强制转换为此接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: Use this primary interface only when the method you want to use shares the same name as an event of the COM object; in this case, cast to this interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

summary.span: 否则，使用.NET 接口派生自 COM coclass 访问方法、 属性和事件的 COM 对象。

span.span: Otherwise, use the .NET interface that is derived from the COM coclass to access methods, properties, and events of the COM object.

summary.span: 有关 COM 对象的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the COM object, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Application

summary.span: 返回表示 Outlook application 对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the parent Outlook application for the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Class As OlObjectClass

summary.span: 返回常量，指示对象的类。

span.span: Returns an constant indicating the object's class.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Detail { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 代表后相邻的窗体区域的显示名称显示在标题中的运行时的文本。

span.span: Returns or sets a String (string in C#) representing the text displayed at runtime in the header after the display name of an adjoining form region.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: Detail属性对于相邻窗体区域仅显示。对于独立窗体区域，它将被忽略。
Detail属性是可选的一个相邻的窗体区域。
The Detail property is displayed for adjoining form regions only. It is ignored for separate form regions.
The Detail property is optional for an adjoining form region.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串） 表示窗体区域的显示名称。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) representing the display name of the form region.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 可选窗体区域的显示名称。如果已定义的值<formRegionName>标记中的相应窗体区域清单 XML 文件，此值将映射到的DisplayName属性的值。窗体区域的 XML 架构的详细信息，请参阅MSDN 库中 Microsoft Outlook 2010 XML 架构参考
DisplayName属性的值显示在显示选项卡的 Microsoft Office Fluent 中运行时单独的窗体区域，或一个相邻的窗体区域的标题中的功能区。 它用于默认的 locale，并且可以通过<stringOverride>相应窗体区域清单 XML 文件中的标记。字符串为不区分大小写，并且其最大长度为 256 个字符。

The display name is optional for a form region. If you have defined a value for the <formRegionName> tag in the corresponding form region manifest XML file, this value will map to the value of the DisplayName property. For more information on the XML schema for form regions, see the Microsoft Outlook 2010 XML Schema Reference in the MSDN Library

The value of the DisplayName property is displayed at runtime in the Show tab of the Microsoft Office Fluent ribbon for a separate form region, or in the header of an adjoining form region. It is used for the default locale, and can be overridden by the <stringOverride> tag in the corresponding form region manifest XML file. The string is case-insensitive, and its maximum length is 256 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableAutoLayout { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 的指定是否使用自动调整大小功能设计窗体设计器中的窗体区域时的版式。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that specifies whether to use the automatic layout resizing feature when designing form regions in the forms designer.

summary.span: 读/写

span.span: Read/write

span.para: 在窗体设计器中自动版式大小调整功能将自动重新计算的窗体布局动态调整窗体。此功能才可用到窗体区域的窗体设计器。
此属性为True时，窗体设计器执行自动版式调整大小。 当此属性为False时，窗体设计器不执行自动版式调整大小。 默认值为True。
The automatic layout resizing feature in the forms designer recalculates the form layout dynamically as the form is resized. This feature is only available to form regions in the forms designer.

When this property is True, the forms designer performs automatic layout resizing. When this property is False, the forms designer does not perform automatic layout resizing. The default value is True.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Form As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Form { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 对象 ，表示 MSForms.UserForm 对象。只读的。

span.span: Returns an Object representing the MSForms.UserForm object. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FormRegionMode As OlFormRegionMode

summary.span: 返回一个 OlFormRegionMode 常量，用于指示该窗体区域是否在读取页、 撰写页，或阅读窗格。只读的。

span.span: Returns an OlFormRegionMode constant that indicates whether the form region is in a read page, compose page, or Reading Pane. Read-only.

span.para: 如果用户具有的阅读窗格中的邮件项目，则可以使用属性可以进一步确定用户是否在编辑模式或阅读的模式的阅读窗格中。邮件项目的阅读窗格中是否是读取模式 （邮件项目处于收件箱或已发送文件夹） 中的编辑模式 （邮件项为草稿文件夹中） 以不同方式显示。

If the user has a mail item in the Reading Pane, you can use the property to further determine if the user is in the edit mode or the read mode of the Reading Pane. A mail item is displayed differently in the Reading Pane if it is in the edit mode (the mail item is in the Draft folder) than if it is in the read mode (the mail item is in the Inbox or Sent folder).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Inspector As Inspector

summary.span: 返回对象，表示承载窗体区域的检查器。

span.span: Returns an object representing the Inspector that hosts the form region.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 如果窗体区域显示在阅读窗格中，则返回Nothing （中的空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) C#）。
Returns Nothing (a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) in C#) if the form region is displayed in the Reading Pane.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InternalName As String
public: property System::String ^ InternalName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串（C# 中的字符串），表示窗体区域的内部编程名称窗体区域清单中定义。

span.span: Returns a String (string in C#) that represents the internal programmatic name of the form region as defined in the manifest for the form region.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 窗体区域所需的内部名称。<名称>相应窗体区域清单 XML 文件中的标记映射到InternalName属性的值。窗体区域的 XML 架构的详细信息，请参阅MSDN 库中 Microsoft Outlook 2010 XML 架构参考
InternalName属性的值使用加载项或 Microsoft Outlook 窗体区域，请参阅例如，若要确定要加载哪个窗体区域或从的本地化的字符串资源加载字符串。InternalName属性仅支持 ASCII 字符。字符串为不区分大小写，并且其最大长度为 256 个字符。

The internal name is required for a form region. The <name> tag in the corresponding form region manifest XML file maps to the value of the InternalName property. For more information on the XML schema for form regions, see the Microsoft Outlook 2010 XML Schema Reference in the MSDN Library

The value of the InternalName property is used by the add-in or Microsoft Outlook to refer to the form region, for example, to determine which form region is being loaded or to load strings from the localized string resources. The InternalName property supports only ASCII characters. The string is case-insensitive, and its maximum length is 256 characters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsExpanded As Boolean
public: property bool IsExpanded { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个boolean 类型的值(C# 中bool )，该值指示是否展开窗体区域。

span.span: Returns a Boolean (bool in C#) that indicates if the form region is expanded.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: 此属性适用于相邻窗体区域，对于独立窗体区域将被忽略。
Outlook 始终先加载窗体区域中扩展状态，并将IsExpanded设置为True。如果窗体区域的初始状态是将折叠，则 Outlook 立即关闭窗体区域，将触发事件正在False，并设置为FalseIsExpanded的参数。
This property applies to adjoining form regions only and is ignored for separate form regions.

Outlook always first loads a form region in an expanded state and sets IsExpanded to True. If the initial state of the form region is to be collapsed, then Outlook immediately closes the form region, fires the event with the parameter being False, and sets IsExpanded to False.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Item As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Item { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回对应于绑定到窗体区域的 Outlook 项的 对象 。只读的。

span.span: Returns an Object corresponding to the Outlook item bound to the form region. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Language As Integer
public: property int Language { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个整数(C# 中int ) 值，该值指示当前语言的 LCID。

span.span: Returns an Integer (int in C#) value that indicates the LCID for the current language.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Parent { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回父 对象 的窗体区域。只读的。

span.span: Returns the parent Object of the form region. Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Reflow() runtime managed

summary.span: 使 Outlook 重新计算相邻窗体区域的高度，从而显示该窗体区域中的所有可视控件。

span.span: Causes Outlook to recalculate the height of an adjoining form region to display all the visible controls in the form region.

span.para: Reflow方法仅适用于相邻窗体区域。对于独立窗体区域会不执行任何操作。
The Reflow method only applies to adjoining form regions. No action occurs for separate form regions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Select() runtime managed

summary.span: 激活该窗体区域，使其变得可见。

span.span: Makes the form region the active form region such that it becomes visible.

span.para: 如果窗体区域是相邻的窗体区域，然后选择将展开窗体区域 （如果尚未将其展开） 并在该页面上的第一个控件上设置焦点。如果窗体区域是单独的窗体区域并尚不活动页，然后选择将切换到窗体区域页面和该页面上的第一个控件上设置焦点。如果窗体区域是单独的窗体区域，并已在活动页，则没有任何变化。

If the form region is an adjoining form region, then Select will expand the form region (if it is not already expanded) and set focus on the first control on that page. If the form region is a separate form region and is not already the active page, then Select will swtich to the form region page and set focus on the first control on that page. If the form region is a separate form region and is already the active page, then nothing happens.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Session As NameSpace

summary.span: 返回对象的当前会话。

span.span: Returns the object for the current session.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

span.para: Session属性和可以交替使用方法来获取当前会话的NameSpace对象。这两个成员的作用相同。例如，以下语句对执行相同的功能：

The Session property and the method can be used interchangeably to obtain the NameSpace object for the current session. Both members serve the same purpose. For example, the following pairs of statements perform the same function:

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetControlItemProperty (object Control, string PropertyName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetControlItemProperty([in]object Control, [in]string PropertyName) runtime managed
Public Sub SetControlItemProperty (Control As Object, PropertyName As String)
public: void SetControlItemProperty(System::Object ^ Control, System::String ^ PropertyName);

param.name: Control
param.span: 指属性指定的窗体区域中的控件将绑定。

span.span: A control in the form region to which the property specified by will be bound.

param.name: PropertyName
param.span: 将要绑定到控件的属性名称。

span.span: The name of the property that will be bound to the control.

summary.span: 将显式的内置属性或自定义属性绑定到窗体区域中的控件。

span.span: Binds an explicit built-in property or a custom property to a control in the form region.

span.para: 您可以使用此方法将的显式内置属性或自定义属性绑定到控件。您必须引用的属性由其字符串的名称，例如，为主题，而非命名空间，例如， http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/proptag/0x0037001E。
参数不区分大小写。例如， SetControlItemProperty解释参数， customerid，为CustomerID相同，并将指定的控件绑定到内置属性。
而不使用的SetControlItemProperty方法对象，您还可以使用类似于以下的代码将如Subject属性的某个属性绑定到控件：

You can use this method to bind an explicit built-in property or a custom property to a control. You must reference the property by its string name, for example, Subject, and not by namespace, for example, http://schemas.microsoft.com/mapi/proptag/0x0037001E.
The parameter is not case-sensitive. For example, SetControlItemProperty interprets an argument, CustomerId, to be the same as CustomerID and binds the specified control to the built-in property.
Other than using the SetControlItemProperty method of a object, you can also use code similar to the following to bind a property such as the Subject property to a control:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SuppressControlReplacement { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个布尔(C# 中bool ) 的禁用 Outlook 从在设计时和运行时自动替换由应用了主题的 Outlook 控件 Forms 2.0 控件。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean (bool in C#) that disables Outlook from automatically replacing a Forms 2.0 control by a themed Outlook control at design time and runtime.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: 在 Outlook 自动替换 Forms 2.0 控件通过应用了主题的 Outlook 相应控件的详细信息，请参阅自定义窗体中的控件
For more information on Outlook automatically replacing a Forms 2.0 control by a themed Outlook counterpart control, see Controls in a Custom Form

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Visible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置(bool的 C#) 值，该值指示窗体区域是可见还是隐藏。

span.span: Returns or sets a (bool for C#) value that indicates whether the form region is visible or hidden.

summary.span: 为可读/写属性。

span.span: Read/write.

span.para: True如果窗体区域可见;False如果它处于隐藏状态。默认值为True。
Visible属性用于控制对信息的访问而不在窗体区域中显示它。
True if the form region is visible; False if it is hidden. The default is True.
Use the Visible property to control access to information without displaying it in a form region.
